data.name: Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania - Suezo
data.detailed_description:
Play as the one-eyed monster from the Monster Rancher series.

©1997 KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD. All rights reserved.
data.about_the_game:
Play as the one-eyed monster from the Monster Rancher series.

©1997 KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD. All rights reserved.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, 512 MB or AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
